import React from 'react' import Code from './Code' import Terminal from './Terminal' import Memory from './Memory' const App = () => { const headerStyle = { margin: 0, padding: "1em", } const titleStyle = { margin: 0, } const mainStyle = { display: "flex", justifyContent: "center", flexGrow: 1, } const executeInstruction = (CO, OP, CI, AC) => { switch (OP) { case 0x0: // JP break case 0x1: // JZ break case 0x2: // JN break case 0x3: // LV break case 0x4: // + break case 0x5: // - break case 0x6: // * break case 0x7: // / break case 0x8: // LD break case 0x9: // MM break case 0xa: // SC break case 0xb: // RS break case 0xc: // HM break case 0xd: // GD break case 0xe: // PD break case 0xf: // OS break default: console.error('Instrução desconhecida') } } return ( <>

Simulador de Máquina de Von Neumann

) } export default App
